On Saturday, Pope Benedict XVI said priests had an important pastoral job to discern whether would-be spouses are prepared and able to enter into a valid marriage. The church and society at large place too much importance on the good of marriage and the family founded on it to not make a profound commitment to it pastorally, Pope Benedict XVI said.
